SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface IUserManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserManager
public interface IUserManager
The IUserManager interface defines the contract for user authentication and management.

This interface specifies the operations required for:

  • User authentication (login/logout)
  • Password management
  • User retrieval and session tracking
  • Persisting user data

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • login

      boolean login(String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the provided credentials.
      Parameters:
      nric - The user's NRIC (unique identifier)
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful, false otherwise

    • logout

      void logout()
      Logs out the current user.

    • changePassword

      boolean changePassword(String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the current user's password.

      This operation requires the user to be logged in and to provide their current password.

      Parameters:
      oldPassword - The user's current password
      newPassword - The new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully changed, false otherwise

    • getCurrentUser

      User getCurrentUser()
      Gets the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The current user, or null if no user is logged in

    • getUser

      User getUser(String nric)
      Gets a user by their NRIC number.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to look up
      Returns:
      The User with the specified NRIC, or null if not found

    • saveUsers

      void saveUsers()
      Saves all user data to persistent storage.
